summary: Adds a shrine that spawns a powerful Nemesis boss
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][color=#ffff00]Nemesis Shrine[/color][/center][/size]


You must find the book "Souls Black and White" and travel to the circle of ruins near Rorikstead to activate the shrine.  The shrine will activate and you can fight a copy of yourself to claim a dragon soul.

This is my entry for the /r/skyrimmods Boss Battles Contest, but is not finished to the level I would like.  Head over to the site and vote:
[center]
[u]http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/324wma/skyrim_modding_contest_2_submission_thread/[/u][/center]

The balance of the Nemesis may be wildly off depending on your level of progress. Some things I would like to add eventually are:

[list]
[*]Scaling of weapon and armor temper for Nemesis (default 2.0 item health now)
[*]Adding proper enchantments to nemesis gear
[*]Allow nemesis to turn into a skeleton on death like dragons do (this is done via custom armors, as changing the race of the nemesis changes the race of the character)
[/list]
There are a few bugs but overall this should be a fun battle (watch out, the nemesis will use shouts, it seems to prefer the 'Ice Form" shout!)

If you are having trouble finding the required book to activate the shrine, I have 'conveniently' placed one in Wolfskull Cave on the main altar.
author: DirtyUncleRon69
